title: Hot and Sweaty Rex
description: Vincent, raptor dinosaur PI, narrates job for LA mob boss Frank Tallarico, tailing rival. Vince needs cash for debts, follows target to Miami with pal Glenda. Hadrosaur mob boss is Jack Dugan, Vince's long-ago pal, now in wheelchair. Vince lost fianc√©e then too, Noreen Dugan, to mixup. Can Vince be double agent with double loyalties when Dugan camp has a spy?
author: Eric Garcia
